eventDecorators.name: AddressSet
eventDecorators.description: EVENTS ///. Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: AdminReplaced
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: DisputeAttachmentAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: DisputeRaised
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: DisputeResolved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: HashUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: IncompleteFund
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: InvestedInProject
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: InvestorInvested
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: MemberAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: MultipleSCInvited
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NetworkFeeReplaced
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: NftCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: PhasesAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: PhasesUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: RepayInvestor
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: SCConfirmed
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: SingleSCInvited
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TaskComplete
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TaskFunded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TaskHashUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: TasksAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

eventDecorators.name: UpdateCommunityHash
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when someone's membership role is being updated.

functionDecorators.name: addressSet
functionDecorators.description: FUNCTIONS ///.

functionDecorators.name: adminLock
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when community creation is locked or unlocked. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _locked
parameterDecorators.description: bool - the status of adminLock.

functionDecorators.name: adminReplaced
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when HomeFi admin is replaced. modifier onlyHomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _newAdmin
parameterDecorators.description: address - address of the new admin.

functionDecorators.name: autoWithdrawn
functionDecorators.description: Call to event when transfer excess funds back to builder wallet. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _amount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - amount of excess fund.

functionDecorators.name: changeOrderFee
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a task has a change order changing the cost of a task. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the task where the change order occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: _newCost
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the new cost of the task (in the project currency).

functionDecorators.name: changeOrderSC
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a task has a change order that swaps the subcontractor on the task. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the task where the change order occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: _sc
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the subcontractor being added to the task in the change order.

functionDecorators.name: claimedInterest
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an investor claims their repayment with interest. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the community the project is published in.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract the investor loaned to.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the investor claiming interest.

parameterDecorators.name: _interestEarned
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of collateral tokens earned in interest (in project's currency).

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - collateral tokens: principal + interest returned to investor.

functionDecorators.name: communityAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a new investment community is created. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the created investment community.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the user who manages the investment community.

parameterDecorators.name: _currency
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the currency used as collateral in projects within the community.

parameterDecorators.name: _hash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the hash of community metadata used to identify the community.

functionDecorators.name: contractorFeeReleased
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a phase has been completed/ the contractor fee for the phase has been released from escrow. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the index of the completed phase.

functionDecorators.name: contractorInvited
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a new General Contractor is invited and accepted to a HomeFi project. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _contractor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address invited to the project as the general contractor.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseCosts
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array (length = number of phases) of contractor fees to be paid per phase.

functionDecorators.name: debtReduced
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an investor's loan is reduced with repayment done off platform. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the community that the project loan occurred in.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed contract address where the loan was escrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address that supplied the loan/ is receiving repayment.

parameterDecorators.name: _tAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount repaid to the investor (principal + interest) in the project currency.

parameterDecorators.name: _details
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - some _details on why debt is reduced (off chain documents or images).

functionDecorators.name: debtTransferred
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when fractional ownership of a project's debt is transferred. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the community the project is published in.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract tracked by the NFT.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the current owner who is sending the fractional ownership of the NFT.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: address - the new owner who is the recipient of fractional ownership of the NFT.

parameterDecorators.name: _totalAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of debt tokens transferred (in the project's wrapped currency).

functionDecorators.name: disputeAttachmentAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a document is attached to a dispute. modifier onlyDisputeContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the dispute.

parameterDecorators.name: _user
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the user uploading the document.

parameterDecorators.name: _attachment
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the IPFS cid of the dispute attachment document.

functionDecorators.name: disputeRaised
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a new dispute is raised. modifier onlyDisputeContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the dispute within the dispute contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _reason
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - ipfs cid of pdf.

functionDecorators.name: disputeResolved
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a dispute has been arbitrated and funds have been directed to the correct address. modifier onlyDisputeContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _disputeID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/serial of the dispute within the dispute contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _ratified
parameterDecorators.description: bool - true if disputed action was enforced by arbitration, and false otherwise.

parameterDecorators.name: _judgement
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the URI hash of the document to be used to close the dispute.

functionDecorators.name: hashUpdated
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when the hash of a project is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: _updatedHash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - hash of project metadata used to identify the project.

functionDecorators.name: incompleteFund
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an project has incomplete funding. modifier validProject.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: CONSTRUCTOR ///.

functionDecorators.name: investedInProject
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an investor has loaned funds to a project. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _cost
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of currency invested in the project (depends on project currency).

functionDecorators.name: investorInvested
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an investor loans funds to a project. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the community the project is published in.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract the investor loaned funds to.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the investing user.

parameterDecorators.name: _cost
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount of funds invested by _investor, in the project currency.

functionDecorators.name: memberAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a member has been added to an investment community as a new investor. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the investment community being joined.

parameterDecorators.name: _member
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the user joining the community as an investor.

functionDecorators.name: multipleSCInvited
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when subcontractors are invited to tasks. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskList
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - the list of uuids of the tasks the subcontractors are being invited to.

parameterDecorators.name: _scList
parameterDecorators.description: address[] - the addresses of the users being invited as subcontractor to the tasks.

functionDecorators.name: networkFeeReplaced
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when HomeFi treasury network fee is updated. modifier onlyHomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _newBuilderFee
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - percentage of fee builder have to pay to rigor system.

parameterDecorators.name: _newInvestorFee
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - percentage of fee investor have to pay to rigor system.

functionDecorators.name: nftCreated
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a new project & accompanying ERC721 token have been created. modifier onlyHomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _id
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the ERC721 enumerable serial/ project id.

parameterDecorators.name: _owner
parameterDecorators.description: address - address permissioned as project's builder/ nft owner.

functionDecorators.name: phasesAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a project has phases added. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseCosts
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array of added phases' costs.

functionDecorators.name: phasesUpdated
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a project's phases are updated. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseList
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array of phase indices to mutate cost for.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseCosts
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array of phaseCosts to change with array index corresponding to _phaseList[index] task.

functionDecorators.name: projectAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a project is created (new NFT is minted). modifier onlyHomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _projectID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the ERC721 enumerable index/ uuid of the project.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the newly deployed project contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _builder
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the user permissioned as the project's builder.

functionDecorators.name: projectPublished
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a project is added to an investment community for fund raising. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the community being published to.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed project contract where loans are escrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _apr
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the annual percentage return (interest rate) on loans made to the project.

functionDecorators.name: repayInvestor
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when an investor's loan is repaid with interest. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the community that the project loan occurred in.

parameterDecorators.name: _project
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the deployed contract address where the loan was escrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: _investor
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address that supplied the loan/ is receiving repayment.

parameterDecorators.name: _tAmount
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the amount repaid to the investor (principal + interest) in the project currency.

functionDecorators.name: scConfirmed
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a subcontractor is confirmed for a task. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskList
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - the uuid's of the taskList joined by the subcontractor.

functionDecorators.name: singleSCInvited
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a subcontractor is invited to a task. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the task the subcontractor is being invited to.

parameterDecorators.name: _sc
parameterDecorators.description: address - the address of the user being invited as subcontractor to the task.

functionDecorators.name: taskComplete
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a task has been completed. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the completed task.

functionDecorators.name: taskFunded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a task is funded. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskIDs
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array of uuid of the funded task.

functionDecorators.name: taskHashUpdated
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a task's identifying hash is changed. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid of the updated task.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskHash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes[] - bytes conversion of IPFS hash.

functionDecorators.name: tasksAdded
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a new task is created in a project. modifier validProject.

parameterDecorators.name: _phaseID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the phase to which the task was added.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskCosts
parameterDecorators.description: uint256[] - array of added tasks' costs.

parameterDecorators.name: _taskHashes
parameterDecorators.description: bytes[] - bytes array of added tasks' hash part 1.

functionDecorators.name: treasuryReplaced
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when HomeFi treasury is replaced. modifier onlyHomeFi.

parameterDecorators.name: _newTreasury
parameterDecorators.description: address - address of the new treasury.

functionDecorators.name: updateCommunityHash
functionDecorators.description: Call to emit when a community's identifying hash is updated. modifier onlyCommunityContract.

parameterDecorators.name: _communityID
parameterDecorators.description: uint256 - the uuid/ serial of the investment community whose hash is being updated.

parameterDecorators.name: _newHash
parameterDecorators.description: bytes - the new hash of community metadata used to identify the community being added.
